title: Scars
lyrics:
I'm dying, I'm hurting, I wish you were dead
Don't reach out for my hand, I'll stab you instead
You said you won't hurt me, but look what you did
I'll pretend I don't need no help, but I said, "I need you bad"

Just one more lie and then I fall
Don't play pretend, you had it all
I'd kill for you, don't even start
Dancing alone all in the dark
